sections.heading: Instructions; oral explanation prohibited; failure to reduce instructions to writing; failure of court to perform duty; effect
sections.text: No oral explanation of any instruction authorized by the preceding sections shall, in any case, be allowed, and any instruction or charge, or any portion of a charge or inst

sections.heading: mandatory; applies to both civil and criminal cases. Ehrlich v. State, 44 Neb. 810, 63 N.W. 35 (1895).
sections.text: mandatory; applies to both civil and criminal cases. Ehrlich v. State, 44 Neb. 810, 63 N.W. 35 (1895).
